mapper.insert: insert into wish_list(prod_code, user_id, in_date, in_user, up_date, up_user) values (#{prodCode}, #{userId}, current_time, current_user, current_time , current_user)
mapper.select: select count(*) from wish_list where prod_code = #{prodCode} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from wish_list where prod_code = #{prodCode} AND user_id = #{userId}
